title: Heart Hands Medium Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Medium Light Skin Tone Heart Hands
description: Two hands forming a heart shape, with a medium-light skin tone. This emoji expresses love, affection, support, and gratitude.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the heart hands emoji showcases two hands coming together to form a heart shape, rendered with a soft, medium-light skin tone. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting give these hands a gentle, rounded appearance, conveying warmth and affection. This emoji is a beautiful visual metaphor for love, care, and emotional connection, often used to express deep feelings on Apple devices.
